H4904.def: = state in which humans are lying down to rest

H3915.def: = the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship

H1245.def: = action by which deities, humans, or animals make an intensive effort to locate (other) humans, animals, objects, or activities, which often requires them to move from one location to another

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H5315.def: = the part of the body connecting the head to the rest of the body and containing the passageways for blood, air, and food; ≈ associated with breathing, appetite, and life and often used metonymically to refer to the entire body and the personality inhabiting it

H157.def: = state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice

H4672.def: = process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for

H5437.def: = process by which a door is attached to a wall by means of a {L:hinge<SDBH:צִיר>}, or a contraption with a similar function, which allows it to pivot

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H7339.def: = central part of a city where people meet and where civic and commercial activities take place, usually at the intersection of streets and roads

H517.def: = direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H2315.def: = area enclosed by walls or partitions, floor, and ceiling; ◄ part of building

H2029.def: = process by which someone becomes pregnant

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H7650.def: = action by which humans or deities make a solemn statement often calling on a higher power to confirm that what is said is true or to punish the speaker if it turns out not to be true

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H176.def: = particle linking two entities by which X and Y are alternative options that exclude each other

H7704.def: = a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H5782.def: = process by which someone wakes up from his sleep

H160.def: = affection between people, or between people and deities

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H2654.def: = state in which humans and deities are emotionally attached to (other) humans

H4310.def: = a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H4057.def: = area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals

H8490.def: = process by which smoke rises up in the shape of a column

H4753.def: = the gum of a bush or shrub with thick thorny branches that project and bend at odd angles; its leaves come in sets of three; its fruit is oval like a plum; its wood and bark have a pleasant smell; the gum oozes naturally from the branches; clear or yellowish brown when it comes out, but gets darker as it dries; ◄ Commiphora myrrha, abyssinica, or schimperi; ► an ingredient of anointing oil and perfume; ≈ regarded as precious

H3828.def: = yellow or reddish gum produced by the Boswellia tree, a shrub that reaches 3 m high, with multiple trunks and small greenish or white flowers; the gum comes out in drops from the branches; ◄ Boswellia sacra; ► ingredient of the incense burned in the tabernacle

H81.def: = finely powdered substance producing a nice scent; ► used as perfume

20.gl: (people moving like a column of) perfumed (smoke)

H8010.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► king of Judah and {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; given the name {L:Jedidiah<SDBH:יְדִידְיָהּ>} at his birth

H4296.def: = a low platform standing on four legs, a bit longer than the length of a man, and about 70-80 centimeters wide; ► used by people of means to sit or sleep on

H8346.def: = state in which a countable entity is the sixth in a range

H1368.def: = a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H2719.def: = sharp object; ◄ made out of iron or flint; ► used as tool for various purposes

H3925.def: = process by which humans or animals acquire knowledge or skill from an identified or unidentified source, ► which usually results in a specific behavior or skill

H4421.def: = armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

H3409.def: = the upper part of the leg of humans and animals

H6343.def: = process by which humans tremble or shake, ◄ as a result of a strong emotion of fear and concern for one's safety

H3915.def: = the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H8010.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► king of Judah and {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; given the name {L:Jedidiah<SDBH:יְדִידְיָהּ>} at his birth

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H668.def: = bed or seat carried by a number of bearers; ► used by a king or queen or someone else in authority

H6086.def: = any kind of tall, woody plant that grows from a single trunk and with several lateral branches that often bear leaves and fruit

H3844.def: = range of mountains; ◄ north of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; ► known for the {L:cedar<SDBH:אֶרֶז>} and other trees growing there

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H5982.def: = a tall, vertical structure ◄ made of metal, stone, or wood ► and used as support for a building or for decoration

H3701.def: = silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins

H2091.def: = metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity

H4817.def: = a group of {L:chariots<SDBH:מֶרְכָּבָה>}, usually owned by one single person

H713.def: = woven material, dyed reddish-purple with a substance obtained from the murex shellfish

H7528.def: exact meaning unsure; possibly: = causative action by which humans cover a flat service with small stones of different sizes so that it produces an even and stable underground

H160.def: = affection between people, or between people and deities

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H6726.def: = mountain; ► that part of {L:Jerusalem<SDBH:יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם>} on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, YHWH's dwelling place

H7200.def: = process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily --though not necessarily exclusively-- with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H8010.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► king of Judah and {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; given the name {L:Jedidiah<SDBH:יְדִידְיָהּ>} at his birth

H5850.def: = circular or semi-circular ornamental headdress, ◄ usually made out of precious metals and decorated with jewels, ► worn by kings, priests, and officials as a symbol of authority and status; also given to women by their suitors to win their affection

H517.def: = direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine

H5849.def: = action by which humans or deities place themselves around other humans or groups of people; ► either to attack or to protect

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H2861.def: = ceremony of establishing a marriage relationship between two people including their respective families

H3820.def: = the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

H8057.def: = state in which humans feel and show great joy
